title: My Writing skills are poor .Can I make a career out of it ? Is it possible? - Quora

response.answer_text: To excel in any career, one must be passionate about it! So are you really passionate about writing? If yes, then you can make a career out of it. All you need to do is learn and develop your writing skills. Learn the basics, read books, enroll yourself for online certifications on content writing and use some of the online content writing tools which are available for free. Keep learning and don't give up early! All the best!
